library(devtools)
library(githubinstall)
library(datarium)
data("marketing",package="datarium")
head(marketing,4)
plot(marketing)
x=as.vector(marketing$sales)
y=as.vector(marketing$youtube)
boxplot(x,y)
plot(x,y)
z=as.vector(marketing$facebook)
t=as.vector(marketing$newspaper)
boxplot(x,y,z,t)
cor(marketing)
model=lm(x~y+z+t)
summary(model)
summary(model)$coefficient
confint(model)
sigma(model)/mean(marketing$sales)
